title: Gloria
text:
About
I am a Graduate student at the Memorial University of Newfoundlands studying M.A. Economics.. My research program is broad and covers a myriad of areas in applied and theoretical economics, health policy, nutrition, chronic disease, and statistics. My current research is focused on the economic development of Canadian First Nations communities through improvements in water infrastructure, nutrition, and overall health

Professional Summary

High performing financial professional with five years of experience in data analysis, investment advisory, credit risk analysis, economic analysis, and people management. Technically astute and proficient in gathering, analyzing, and forecasting panel data, time series, cross-sectional and pooled data. Strong track record of inspiring effective cross functional collaboration and innovative problem solving in a high-stake setting and committed to team improvement and impacting team success.
